metadata.purpose: Chronological timeline of Autopack issues, fixes, and evolution for AI-driven root cause analysis
metadata.scope: Last 5 Cursor chat sessions covering BUILD-129 Phase 3 implementation and drain operations

issues.symptom: Builder failed: ndjson_no_operations - operations list empty despite model output
issues.root_cause: Model emitting top-level JSON wrapper {"files":[...]} instead of NDJSON lines; parser decoded but treated as single op and dropped
issues.impact: Systemic blocker - phases cannot apply any operations

fix.description: Parser now expands {"files":[...]} wrapper into NDJSON operations; truncate-tolerant scan extracts inner file objects even if outer wrapper incomplete

issues.verification: 3 single-batch drains showed ndjson_no_operations: 0 occurrences; operations recovered and applied

issues.symptom: Deliverables validation fails with 'Found in patch: 6/17 files' across multiple retry attempts
issues.root_cause: validate_deliverables() only checked current patch text; NDJSON earlier attempts wrote files to disk but later attempts didn't re-emit them in synthetic diff
issues.impact: Multi-attempt convergence impossible; phases stuck in retry loop

fix.description: Cumulative validation: existing deliverables on disk now satisfy requirements

issues.verification: Phases could complete across multiple truncated attempts

issues.symptom: Writes to src/*, docs/*, tests/* rejected as 'outside scope'
issues.root_cause: Inferred scope paths included bucket roots like 'code/tests/docs'; _determine_workspace_root() picked C:\dev\Autopack\code instead of repo root
issues.impact: False 'outside scope' blocks prevent valid file operations

fix.description: Heuristic: if scope starts with src/docs/tests/etc., treat workspace as repo root; flatten bucketed deliverables {code:[...], tests:[...]} to prevent 'code' becoming a scope root

issues.symptom: Nonsense scope entries like 'Improved' causing 'outside manifest' violations
issues.root_cause: Prose deliverables like 'Logging configuration' treated as file paths
issues.impact: Manifest validation fails on non-existent file paths

fix.description: Sanitizer filters out prose bullets (non-path strings) before scope/manifest/validator logic

issues.symptom: Patch validation failed - incomplete diff structure on NDJSON synthetic header
issues.root_cause: Executor called git apply on synthetic 'NDJSON Operations Applied...' header (not a real diff)
issues.impact: Apply phase fails even though operations already applied to disk

fix.description: GovernedApplyPath.apply_patch() detects NDJSON synthetic header and skips git apply while still enforcing scope/protected-path validation

issues.symptom: Doctor/replan triggered after TOKEN_ESCALATION, resetting state and preventing P10 retry budget from being applied
issues.root_cause: TOKEN_ESCALATION treated as diagnosable failure instead of control-flow signal
issues.impact: P10 escalation loop never converges; retries don't use escalated token budget

fix.description: Skip Doctor/diagnostics/replan for TOKEN_ESCALATION; advance retry_attempt deterministically

issues.symptom: git reset --hard / git clean -fd could be executed mid-convergence, wiping partial deliverables
issues.root_cause: Doctor execute_fix with fix_type=git allowed in project_build runs
issues.impact: Convergence blocked by destructive repo operations; traceability lost

fix.description: Block execute_fix with fix_type=git for project_build; record reason in debug journal

issues.verification: log_fix() now auto-creates issue entry if missing; includes run_id/phase_id/outcome

issues.symptom: Drain reports queued>0 but executor says 'No more executable phases'
issues.root_cause: Drain script counted queued phases from local SQLite; executor queried API server pointing at different DB (API/DB mismatch)
issues.impact: Drains silently stall; queued phases never execute

fix.description: Default to ephemeral AUTOPACK_API_URL (free localhost port) when not set; ensures API and drain script use same DATABASE_URL

issues.symptom: GET /runs/{id} returns empty phases list; executor sees no executable work
issues.root_cause: RunResponse schema missing top-level phases field; only serialized Tier rows (missing for patch-scoped/legacy runs)
issues.impact: Executor cannot select queued phases from tierless runs

fix.description: RunResponse includes top-level phases list; works for runs with/without Tier rows

issues.symptom: POST /update_status returns 400 'Invalid phase state: BLOCKED'
issues.root_cause: Executor sending 'BLOCKED' status; API only accepts PhaseState enum values (no BLOCKED)
issues.impact: Phase state updates fail; DB state incorrect

fix.description: Map 'BLOCKED' → 'FAILED' in _update_phase_status and governance handler

issues.symptom: PhaseFinalizer crashes with JSONDecodeError when parsing report_path
issues.root_cause: CI only persisted text log; PhaseFinalizer assumed report_path was pytest-json-report JSON file
issues.impact: Phase finalization fails; cannot compute test baseline delta

fix.description: pytest CI now emits JSON report (--json-report); PhaseFinalizer delta computation wrapped to never crash phase execution

issues.verification: CI results include both report_path (JSON) and log_path (text)

issues.symptom: Phases permanently FAILED despite '✅ Approval GRANTED (auto-approved)' in logs
issues.root_cause: PhaseFinalizer hard-failed any phase with quality_report.is_blocked=True; didn't consider human_approved override
issues.impact: Quality gate deadlock; phases cannot reach COMPLETE even with no regressions

fix.description: Thread human_approved into quality_report; PhaseFinalizer treats blocked-but-human-approved as warning (still blocks on critical regressions)

issues.verification: research-system-v17 phases completed with auto-approval override

issues.symptom: governed_apply rejects patch: 'Unsafe patch: attempts to create existing file as new'
issues.root_cause: Full-file diff generator emitted 'new file mode 100644' for existing files (old_content missing)
issues.impact: Apply blocked for valid patches

fix.description: If diff about to be emitted as 'new file mode' but path exists on disk, read existing content and emit modify diff

issues.symptom: governed_apply rejects valid modified files with 'unclosed quote' error
issues.root_cause: _detect_truncated_content() collected '+' lines from ALL diffs including modified files; diff hunks don't represent full file content
issues.impact: False positive truncation detection on ordinary modifications

fix.description: Only run unclosed-quote/YAML truncation heuristics for new files (--- /dev/null), not modifications

issues.symptom: Builder failed: None (unhelpful error) when modify operation truncated
issues.root_cause: NDJSON modify operations missing 'operations' list raised ValueError; phase fails with no useful diagnostic
issues.impact: Truncation scenarios produce confusing failures

fix.description: Introduce NDJSONSkipOperation; missing modify operations treated as skipped (non-fatal); result includes skipped list

issues.symptom: NDJSON apply: replace_all with empty old_text causes partial apply failures
issues.root_cause: Malformed replace_all ops (empty old_text from truncation) raised ValueError; entire apply failed
issues.impact: Partial NDJSON apply blocking convergence

fix.description: Treat replace_all with empty old_text as no-op with warning instead of raising exception

issues.symptom: pytest collection: 14 errors from import failures (SQLAlchemy table redefinition, missing CLI commands, diagnostics APIs)
issues.root_cause: Multiple issues: (1) backend models imported via two paths creating duplicate SQLAlchemy Base, (2) tests expected autopack.cli.commands.* package layout, (3) missing compat exports for diagnostics
issues.impact: CI collection failures block all tests; phases fail quality gate

fix.commit: Multiple commits for pytest collection fixes
fix.description: Consolidated SQLAlchemy imports; created CLI commands package; added diagnostics compat shims; created tracer_bullet test-facing package

issues.verification: pytest --collect-only reported 1102 tests collected (down from 14 errors)

issues.symptom: Research test collection failures: missing ResearchHookManager, ResearchPhaseConfig, ReviewConfig
issues.root_cause: Tests expected legacy API surface that was refactored; new storage-oriented classes didn't match test expectations
issues.impact: CI collection failures; research-system-v12+ drains blocked

fix.description: Added compatibility shims: ResearchHookManager/Trigger/Result, ResearchPhaseConfig/Result, ReviewConfig/Result; restored lifecycle methods (start/complete/fail/cancel); fixed helper methods (pagination, URL check, scope precedence)

issues.verification: research-system-v17 completed 2 phases; newly failing tests reduced from 16 to 0
persistent_issues: Some tests still expect network/LLM mocks

issues.symptom: src/research/frameworks/market_attractiveness.py: NameError: List is not defined
issues.root_cause: Missing 'List' import in type annotations
issues.impact: Collection error blocks research-meta-analysis

fix.description: Added 'from typing import List'

issues.symptom: suspicious_shrinkage guard blocks >60% deletions
issues.root_cause: Intentional safety guard
issues.impact: Phases requiring mass deletions blocked unless allow_mass_deletion=true in spec
issues.mitigation: Phase spec must explicitly allow_mass_deletion for intentional large deletions

issues.symptom: MAX_ATTEMPTS_EXHAUSTED after 5 retry attempts
issues.root_cause: Real convergence failure; repeated truncation/patch failures exhausted retry budget
issues.impact: Phase failed legitimately
issues.requires: New run with fresh retry counters or manual intervention

issues.symptom: Protected path modification requires manual approval
issues.root_cause: Governance rule: src/autopack/config.py modification blocked
issues.impact: Phase waits for human approval
issues.requires: Human approval or phase replan to avoid protected paths

issues.symptom: CI collection/import errors (pytest exitcode=2) were not treated as deterministic blockers; errors live under collectors[] while tests[] is empty
issues.root_cause: PhaseFinalizer/TestBaselineTracker read only tests[] and summary; pytest-json-report encodes collection failures as failed collectors entries
issues.impact: Systemic gate hole: phases could be incorrectly treated as complete / overridable despite ImportError during collection

fix.description: Treat failed collectors[] as blocking even when baseline is missing; add regression test simulating exitcode=2 with tests=[]

issues.verification: Unit tests passed; regression test added for failed collectors blocking without baseline

issues.symptom: Chunked drains on Windows rejected in-scope patches as 'Outside scope' due to backslashes/dot-slash variants in scope_paths
issues.root_cause: Scope enforcement compared unnormalized relative paths; scope paths could be '.\\src\\...' while patch paths are 'src/...' (POSIX-style)
issues.impact: Systemic PATCH_FAILED in multi-batch drains despite valid patches

fix.description: Normalize scope and patch paths (trim, \\→/, strip ./, collapse slashes) before comparing; add regression test

issues.verification: Regression tests passed; Chunk2B scope issue reported unblocked

issues.symptom: Autopack-internal drains dead-end with protected_path_violation even when queued phase scope targets src/autopack/*
issues.root_cause: drain_queued_phases.py always instantiated AutonomousExecutor with run_type=project_build, forcing protected-path governance for internal maintenance phases
issues.impact: Systemic drain blocker; requires manual governance approval or cannot drain internal runs

fix.description: Add --run-type (or AUTOPACK_RUN_TYPE) and pass through to AutonomousExecutor so internal phases can run as autopack_maintenance

issues.verification: Verified by re-running drain with --run-type autopack_maintenance and observing phase completion without protected_path dead-end

issues.symptom: Deliverables validation fails with 'Found in patch: 0 files' when Builder returns structured edit plan (patch_content == '')
issues.root_cause: Deliverables validation only inspected patch_content and workspace; structured edit plans communicate touched files via edit_plan.operations not via unified diff
issues.impact: False deliverables gate failures; unnecessary retries / MAX_ATTEMPTS_EXHAUSTED risk

fix.description: Thread edit_plan.operations[*].file_path as touched_paths into validate_deliverables; merge into actual_paths; add regression test

issues.verification: Unit tests passed; RCA doc updated with Blocker O

timeline.phase: Drain Harness Environment + API Autostart Observability (Windows)

issues.symptom: Drain attempts fail with 'connection refused' to Postgres localhost:5432 when DATABASE_URL unset
issues.root_cause: drain_queued_phases.py defaulted DATABASE_URL too late (after SessionLocal import); SessionLocal binds DB URL at import time
issues.impact: Operational drain failures; confusing infra errors; wasted cycles

fix.description: Default DATABASE_URL to sqlite:///autopack.db when autopack.db exists; move logic before importing autopack.database

issues.verification: Subsequent drain runs no longer attempted Postgres when DATABASE_URL was unset

issues.symptom: Drain aborted with 'API server failed to start within 10 seconds' on Windows/cold starts
issues.root_cause: Hardcoded 10s timeout; uvicorn subprocess stdout/stderr discarded (no visibility); PYTHONPATH adjustments in parent did not propagate to subprocess
issues.impact: Systemic drain abort; no diagnostics to distinguish slow-start vs crash

fix.description: Configurable AUTOPACK_API_STARTUP_TIMEOUT_SECONDS (default 30s); pass PYTHONPATH=src; write startup logs to .autonomous_runs/<run_id>/diagnostics/api_server_<host>_<port>.log

issues.verification: With AUTOPACK_API_STARTUP_TIMEOUT_SECONDS=30, API started and drain progressed to a real CI collection/import gate

issues.symptom: Drain triage costs high due to dual auditor calls for quick systemic diagnosis
issues.root_cause: Drain script always used dual-auditor mode
issues.impact: Slow/expensive triage loops when chasing systemic blockers

fix.description: Add --no-dual-auditor to reduce LLM calls during fast triage

fully_resolved: DELIV-001: Cumulative validation enables multi-attempt convergence
RETRY-001: TOKEN_ESCALATION no longer triggers Doctor
SAFETY-001: git execute_fix blocked for project_build
API-002: Invalid BLOCKED state mapped to FAILED
DIFF-001: New file mode detection fixed
APPLY-002: Truncation detector scoped to new files only

cascade: Led to DELIV-001 (deliverables not found because ops not applied)
Led to RETRY-001 (repeated retries without convergence)
Led to SAFETY-001 (Doctor attempted git reset to recover)
Led to APPLY-001 (operations applied but rejected as outside scope)
Led to FINALIZER-001 (quality gate always blocked)
Led to RESEARCH-001 (research tests couldn't run)

common_failure_modes.pattern: Validation logic only checking current attempt, not cumulative state
common_failure_modes.fix_approach: Check both patch content AND disk state

common_failure_modes.pattern: Parser/detector treating partial/synthetic content as full content
common_failure_modes.fix_approach: Add context-aware detection (is this synthetic? is this a partial diff?)

common_failure_modes.pattern: Missing API contract validation between components
common_failure_modes.fix_approach: Add compatibility shims; validate schema before transmission

common_failure_modes.pattern: Control flow signals treated as errors
common_failure_modes.fix_approach: Distinguish intentional signals from diagnostic failures

high_frequency_fix_targets.reason: Core parser; changes affect all NDJSON operations
Main execution orchestrator; most fix surface area

key_log_signals_success: [NDJSON:Parse] Recovered X operations from multi-line JSON output
WARN: Quality gate blocked ... but human-approved override present
[NDJSON] Detected synthetic NDJSON patch header; skipping git apply
Found in patch: X files (+Y existing files in workspace)
key_log_signals_failure: Patch validation failed - incomplete diff structure
Unsafe patch: attempts to create existing file
convergence_indicators: P10 escalation followed by successful retry
Deliverables validation: 0 missing when workspace checked

immediate: Monitor for any new systemic blockers not in this timeline
Triage REAL-001/002/003 failures to determine if new runs needed
medium_term: Add telemetry for fix effectiveness (track ndjson_no_operations rate over time)
Create regression suite from issues marked 'fully_resolved'
Document governance override procedures for REAL-003 scenarios
long_term: Consider parser fuzzing to catch new NDJSON format variations
Add proactive validation in Builder output generation
Improve error messages for truncation scenarios (currently 'Builder failed: None')
